definitions.definition: One who benefits or receives an advantage.
examples: You are the lucky beneficiary of this special offer.

definitions.definition: One who benefits from the distribution , especially out of a trust or estate .
examples: If any beneficiary does not survive the settlor for a period of 30 days then the trustee shall distribute that beneficiary ’s share to the surviving beneficiaries by right of representation.

definitions.definition: One who benefits from the payout of an insurance policy .

main_definition: One who benefits or receives an advantage.
secondary_definitions: ( especially trust law ) One who benefits from the distribution , especially out of a trust or estate .
( insurance ) One who benefits from the payout of an insurance policy .
